message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, your offer is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $10,000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $14,000. This is a compromise I'm willing to make to keep the deal going.
